transcript:
Customer: Assalam Walekum.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji. Vinod sir good morning.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Hanji sir Deepika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Service ke regarding sir connect kar rahi thi. Aap kafi time se sir buyleads consume nahi kar rahe hain. Kuch issue aa raha hai?
Customer: [inaudible] koi buylead aisi aati hi nahi hai jo consume karne layak ho. Jo karo to wo udhar udhar ka aisa bilkul wo cheez mangte hain jo bas ka nahi hai.
Executive: Aap thread me deal karte hain aur ye aap UP me hi local me jyada karte hain na deal?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ya all over India?
Customer: Nahi nahi UP UP border ho jaye jaise MP Reeva.
Executive: To dekhiye teen din purani buylead hai. Uttar Pradesh, Tanda ki koi location hai. Inko chahiye yarn. Theek hai? 2000 kg chahiye inhe. Yarn chahiye yarn.
Customer: Yarn yarn.
Executive: Yarn.
Customer: Ek minute hold kijiye.

Executive: Ek kal ki aa rakhi. Hello sir aawaz aa rahi hai aapko meri?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Ek dekho aap recent pe jaoge kal ki ek buylead dikh rahi hogi. Industrial sewing thread Uttar Pradesh Varanasi ki 500 kg chahiye inhe. Order value hai 50,000 se 1 lakh tak ka.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Uske niche bobbin thread hai Varanasi Uttar Pradesh do din purani inko chahiye quantity 100 piece thread chahiye inhe.
Executive: Nearby states location pe click karo aur recent buyleads pe jao sir ek baar aap.
Customer: Kispe?
Executive: Recent buyleads pe. Phone se check kar rahe ho ya laptop system se check kar rahe ho?
Customer: Phone pe wahi IndiaMART pe.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Phone pe IndiaMART pe pehla dikh raha hai Pratapgarh Uttar Pradesh ka.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Dusra hai Varanasi.
Executive: Recent. Accha recent buylead karo na aap relevant pe to nahi ho. Side me do option aate hain recent aur relevant. Blue blue aur green green se color me dikh raha hoga aapko right hand side upar ki taraf uspe recent pe jana hai aapko.
Customer: Haan recent pe gaye.
Executive: Haan theek hai. Ab dekhiye ab aapko buylead dikhne start ho jayegi Uttar Pradesh ki sari. Jo abhi abhi thode time pehle teen din ki ek Gorakhpur.
Customer: Mirzapur hai.
Executive: Order value 1000 ka 1000 ka kya de denge usko hum.
Executive: Varanasi ki 500 kg sewing thread aap to rakhiye sir aapki location ki buyleads aap consume hi nahi kar rahe inhe.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Dikh rahi hai sir aapko?
Customer: Industrial sewing thread 500 kilo chahiye inko yarn chahiye.
Executive: Yarn hi chahiye inko chahiye industrial sewing thread. Yarn inhone nahi likha hua.
Customer: Ye dekhiye likha hai na.
Executive: Kahan pe likha hai likha?
Customer: Quantity 500 kg.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: 500 kg kg me wahi aata hai yarn jo hum jo hum consume karte wo ye.
Executive: Kyunki inhone jo upar likha hua hai wo hai industrial sewing thread chahiye inhe. Aap ek baar inse baat to kariye.
Customer: Haan ye ye khud banate hain iska matlab.
Executive: Haan to banate hain hume.
Customer: Haan aap baat kariye na jab achi quantity ka aapko dikh raha hai do din purani ek aur dikh rahi hogi Varanasi bobbin thread 100 piece chahiye inhe.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Unse baat kar sakte ho. Chahe to mai call par hi hu aap ek baar ye buyleads consume kar lijiye warna sold out ho jayegi fir chali jayegi aapke platform se.
Customer: Ek hai Khushi thread pink polyester quantity 20 kg.
Executive: Ek wo bhi hai Gorakhpur ki jinko KTL sewing thread chahiye 100 box me.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Unse bhi aap baat kar sakte ho. To ye sari buyleads hai consume kariye. Abhi consume kar lijiye mai call par hi hu. Kariye aapne consume?
Customer: Kar raha hu. Katiye to karu fir.
Executive: Nahi abhi chahe send reply kar dijiye mera call cut ho ke unhe call kar lijiyega abhi reply message kar dijiye unhe waha pe option aata hai na. Contact by now pe click karte ho to send reply ka option aata hai call now ka aata hai. Abhi reply kar do fir baad me lead manager pe ja ke in sabko call kar lena ek baar.
Customer: Hello. Kar diya.
Executive: Ek ko kiya. Sari sir. Accha ye jitni aapko dikh rahi hai sir aap consume kariye. Kyunki ye dekhiye aapka ye jo buylead wala page hai aapke algorithm pe hai. Aap jitni jyada Uttar Pradesh ki aur thread ki buylead consume karoge system aapko waisi hi buylead dikhana start kar dega. But ye hai ki abhi aap bahut kam buyleads consume kar rahe hain.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ab ye Khushi thread.
Executive: Kitni buyleads sir aapne aur consume kari?
Customer: Abhi to do kiya hai maine.
Executive: Ek aur kar lijiye.
Executive: Kaun kaun si kari hai ye wali kar li aapne Gorakhpur ki jo aa rakhi hai sewing thread jinhe 100 box chahiye?
Customer: KTL wala na?
Executive: Haan KTL wala.
Customer: Haan kar liya hai. Aur ek hai teen din purani.
Executive: Haan nahi screenshot mat banaiye lead manager pe aapko ye sari buylead dikh jayegi jo aap consume kar rahe ho na. Aur ek aur hai sir Khushi thread pink spun polyester thread Gyanpur ki buylead hai teen din purani. Quantity chahiye 20 kg.
Customer: Kar liya hai.
Executive: Accha aur ek aur hai bobbin thread Varanasi ka 100 piece chahiye inhe quantity me.
Executive: Vinod sir ye profile aap khud hi dekh rahe ho ya koi aapka staff dekhta hai? Aapka maine hold karke rakha otherwise.
Customer: Mai dekh pata hu.
Executive: Accha aap ek kaam kariye mai apna number bata rahi hu aap mera number save kar lijiye. Agar aap future me ab kabhi aap buylead dekhte ho IndiaMART open karke aapko buylead nahi dikh rahi hai kuch problem aa rahi hai aap mere ko call kariye. Mai aapke account manager hu aapki profile mai hi dekhti hu. Theek hai? Mai apna number bata rahi hu likhiye.
Executive: Bolu number?
Customer: Ye jo aapka jo abhi call jis number aaya hai na?
Executive: Haan nahi ye wala nahi mai aapko mera number bata rahi hu jo hamesha aap kabhi bhi us number pe call kar sakte ho.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: 85
Customer: 85
Executive: 870
Customer: 870
Executive: 83
Customer: 83
Executive: 162
Customer: 162. Haanji ye mera number hai Deepika naam se save kar lo. Agar aapko future me koi.
Customer: Save kar liya number.
Executive: Haanji. Save hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Accha accha to sir kabhi bhi aapko lag raha hai jaise aap bata rahe ki buylead hi nahi aa rahi thi ab dekhiye ab maine aapko dikhai. To agar aisa dobara kabhi hota hai aap mere ko call kariye kabhi bhi. Theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ab buyleads pe consume kariye. Daily aap do se teen buylead consume kariye IndiaMART pe aake.
Executive: Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai chaliye thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not consuming buyleads.

Resolution:

- Executive explained how to find recent buyleads.

- Executive shared her contact number.

- Executive explained algorithm for buyleads.

Next Steps: 

- Customer will call executive if issues persist.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, algorithm, contact details
